title: Rp Disappeared
body:
Hello ,
So the other day i bought a skin for 1350 rp . After that i got left about 3700+ rp but when i loged in today all of them is gone i got left 156 rp . It's the same number as it was before i even bouht RP. I still got the skin and my account was not taken by anyone.
Pls HELP .

replies.body: Ahhhh it looks like someone was able to make a bunch of purchases and sent a bunch of gifts recently with that RP. If that wasn't you, it's pretty likely that your account could be compromised. HIt up our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by selecting "I need help recovering my account" and they'll be able to help soon!
